item.title: Effective Photo Management
item.description: What I like about photographs is that they capture a moment that’s gone forever, impossible to reproduce. â€” Karl Lagerfeld Taking photos helps us remember those moments that are gone forever; our time spent with friends and family, our trips abroad, our life. They help us remember places we’re not going to visit again, experiences we’re not going to live again, and those who we’ll never be able to talk to again.
